markdown:
**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 388 2.0 **Duration** 1 minute --- You change your body to better suit the moment. You gain one of the following abilities of your choice. You can Dismiss this spell.
  • You gain a 20-foot status bonus to your Speed.
  • You gain a climb or swim Speed equal to half your Speed.
  • You gain [darkvision](/Rules.aspx?ID=415).
  • You gain a pair of claws. These are [agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170) [finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179) [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) attacks that deal 1d8 slashing damage.
  • You gain [scent](/Rules.aspx?ID=417) 60 feet ([imprecise](/Rules.aspx?ID=412)).
name: Shifting Form

summary_markdown: You change your body to better suit the moment.
text: Shifting Form Single Action Source Player Core pg. 388 2.0 Duration 1 minute --- You change your body to better suit the moment. You gain one of the following abilities of your choice. You can Dismiss this spell. You gain a 20-foot status bonus to your Speed. You gain a climb or swim Speed equal to half your Speed. You gain darkvision. You gain a pair of claws. These are agile finesse unarmed attacks that deal 1d8 slashing damage. You gain scent 60 feet (imprecise).
